thread.title: MrktServ Holdings launches new E-Commerce Initiative for the Automotive Aftermarket
thread.title_full: MrktServ Holdings launches new E-Commerce Initiative for the Automotive Aftermarket - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: MrktServ Holdings launches new E-Commerce Initiative for the Automotive Aftermarket
text:
MrktServ Holdings Inc.
ROLLING MEADOWS, Ill. , Aug. 17, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- MrktServ Holdings Inc., an E-Commerce Solutions Provider, has launched its initiative to enhance the way E-Commerce business is created and managed within the automotive aftermarket. MrktServ Holdings is a rapidly growing, highly interactive e-commerce company bringing a portfolio of solutions to many of the current marketplace challenges in the automotive parts and service business world. Beyond its core leadership, MrktServ Holdings also benefits from the guidance of an advisory board made up of industry leaders and key business professionals.
Two separate additional entities have been formed, including one from a merger, in response to industry demand for a cross-functional system to tie manufacturers, suppliers, service facilities, and retailers together.
Vendor Network is a client service provider that handles specific roles within retailers for assortment management and marketplace management. Shopper Outlet is a content management service provider and marketing agency. All content is custom created for specific retailer business systems. MrktServ Retail provides an array of retail assortment growth options for retailers who find themselves in need of specialized operational and/or system solutions. Ken LeBlanc , CEO, MrktServ Holdings said: "With the continued movement towards true integrated retail across diverse platforms, MrktServ Holdings is well positioned to be an online operational and technical solution for retailers today."
MrktServ Holdings is improving the consumer experience when purchasing products online. MrktServ is providing online solutions in the areas of content management, data creation to sales platforms. MrktServ Clients range in size from small business to large retailers. For more information about MrktServ Holdings and its entities, visit the company's website at http://mrktserv.com/

Director of Marketing
